dataList.name: Duello
dataList.desc:
After Clashing, inflict 1 [DuelEdge] against the target this unit Clashed against
In a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], heal 3 SP for every [DuelEdge] Stack on target (max 15)

dataList.name: Palermitan Style
dataList.desc:
Gain the following effects based on the target's [DuelEdge] Stack
- For every Stack, deal +5% damage against and take -5% damage from the target with [DuelEdge]
- At 1+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Clash Power +1
- At 2+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Base Power +1
- At 3+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Coin Power +1 and inflict 3 [SeveredTendon] On Hit
- At 4+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Final Power +1

dataList.name: Palermitan Rapier / The Cleaving Blade
dataList.desc: If this unit's Skill effects triggered [VibrationExplosion], gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Hunter's Mark
dataList.desc:
Every 3 turns, select a random enemy (except Ryōshū), reduce their Speed to 1, and target it with all of this unit's Skills
(If this effect could not be activated due to Stagger, activate it next turn)

dataList.name: A Textbook with a Singular Purpose
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: gain [TeachersCommand]
In a Clash against Ryōshū, Clash Power -3 and convert the Coins on this unit's Base Attack Skills into [SuperCoin]s.
Also, on Clash Lose, deal -80% damage and any "On Hit" effects do not activate

dataList.name: Searching Arm - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc:
If an Arm is Part Broken, convert the Coins on the remaining Arm's Skills to [SuperCoin]s, and they gain +1 Atk Weight
- When using a Skill affected by this effect, gain 1 [RapidGrowthApple]

dataList.name: Ebony Queen - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc:
If this unit has Roots, gain 1 [HowDareYouApple] after its Fruit Part is hit

At 4 [HowDareYouApple], use a powerful Skill that inflicts powerful negative effects

If this unit does not have Roots, neither gain nor lose [HowDareYouApple]
When the Fruit Part gets broken, lose [HowDareYouApple]

dataList.name: Entangling Roots
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict 2 [Binding] on all enemies
This lasts until the Roots are broken

dataList.name: One Sole Root
dataList.desc:
The Roots Part gains 3 [Enhancement] for every unbroken Arm Part
Does not gain this effect if the Roots are broken

dataList.name: Armor of Protection & Repression
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit isn't Staggered, gain 2 [Protection], 10 [DefenseUp], and Shield HP equal to 10% of this unit's current HP

Every time this unit uses "Repressed Flesh" Skill in this Encounter, gain 1 fewer [Protection], 5 fewer [DefenseUp], and reduce the percentage mentioned above by 5%

dataList.name: Iron Maiden - Spikes
dataList.desc:
If this unit isn't Staggered, when hit by the last Coin of an attacker, activate the following:
- Deal Pierce damage by 20% of the said Coin's damage and inflict 2 [Laceration] (max damage per Skill: 100)
- Damage from this effect cannot Stagger the target

dataList.name: Iron Maiden - Defibrillation
dataList.desc:
Upon entry, heal 30 SP

At 60% HP, recover from Stagger and end the turn (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Corpus Spent as Material
dataList.desc:
Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Burst], [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
Take -50% damage from [Laceration]

dataList.name: Fascia, My Precious Artwork
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 2 [HumanFleshTheRings], [HumanFleshTheRings] expires next turn; then, gain [BoneBladeTheRings]

Turn Start: if this unit has [BoneBladeTheRings], use a powerful attack this turn

If this unit is hit by an Attack Skill before using the powerful attack, gain 1 [UnsteadyTheRings]

dataList.name: Training to Inherit the Name of a Star
dataList.desc: After Attack Skill End, deal (# of Slash Coins that hit Critically x 10) Slash damage against each target (cannot be Staggered due to this damage)

dataList.name: Singular Focus of the Mind
dataList.desc:
This unit's [Breath] Potency is capped at 25
Any excess [Breath] Potency gained past 25 will be converted to [DicipleLittleFinger]

dataList.name: The Orthodox Blade [整劍]
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: gain 50 [DicipleLittleFinger]

dataList.name: Tranquility [靜念]
dataList.desc:
If this unit has [DicipleLittleFinger], gain the following effects:
- SP does not drop below 0; if it was below 0, recover to 0
- Convert any SP damage taken into Gloom damage (save for SP changes due to "Base factors increasing/decreasing Sanity")

dataList.name: Grace
dataList.desc:
In a Clash against targets that aren't Ryōshū, Clash Power -2
Take -20% damage from targets other than Ryōshū

dataList.name: Charmed
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: based on the number of units in the Encounter, inflict [FairyCharm] on Sinners with the slowest Speed
Number of [FairyCharm] units increases every time the Fairy Part is restored

dataList.name: Uncovered Abyss
dataList.desc:
Reveal body when the Fairy Part is broken
All Buffs and Debuffs expire when the Body hides again

dataList.name: Leading Lure
dataList.desc:
Cannot damage Core HP by damaging the Fairy
A certain Skill gains Atk Weight based on the number of [FairyCharm] units

dataList.name: Broken Stump
dataList.desc:
When the Body is broken:
- Fairy will have 60% of its max HP upon restoration
- Core heals +20 more HP with Skill effects

dataList.name: Evolving Lure
dataList.desc: Fairy gains 30% increased max HP with each restoration

dataList.name: Fairy Dust
dataList.desc: When the Fairy is killed, all Identities gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count next turn

dataList.name: Increased Aggression - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc: Use more powerful Skills after the Fairy is restored for the second time

dataList.name: Dimensional Escape
dataList.desc:
Starting from turn 2, this unit summons 4 random Dimensions and hides
- When all Parts are Staggered, this effect activates next turn
- Cannot be Staggered while hidden inside a 'Dimensional Rift'.

dataList.name: Trapped Dimensional Escape
dataList.desc:
When all 'Dimensional Rifts' are broken, this unit voluntarily emerges from a 'Dimensional Rift' next turn
Afterward, this unit loses 5 [Charge] Count and all of its Parts' Stagger Thresholds are raised by 30

dataList.name: Regenerate Dimensional Refraction Blade
dataList.desc:
When the Blade Part is broken, lose 5 [Charge] Count
At the next Turn End, consume 2 [Charge] Count to restore the broken Blade.

While the Blade Part is broken, gain 2 [AttackDown] at every Turn Start.

dataList.name: Forced Dimensional Breach Attempt - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc:
At 60% or less Core HP, end turn and gain a new pattern
- Deactivate "Dimensional Escape" Passive
- Deactivate "Trapped Dimensional Escape" Passive
- If neither of its Arms are broken, use a powerful Skill every few turns

dataList.name: Hemorrhaging Dimension
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage after passing through the Hemorrhaging Dimension

dataList.name: Poisonous Dimension
dataList.desc: Core gains +20% max HP after passing through the Poisonous Dimension

dataList.name: Tremoring Dimension
dataList.desc: Gain 1 Speed after passing through the Tremoring Dimension

dataList.name: Electrifying Dimension
dataList.desc: Gain +1 Coin Power after passing through the Electrifying Dimension
